room.dialogue: I went looking for #Joss^ and came across this hut. The witch let me in, but locked the door. A monster came to her. They tortured me.
You found the #key^! Please release me from these #bonds^.
room.description: A woman hangs from her wrists, clasped to a wall with iron #bonds^.
room.detailedDescription: She has been badly beaten and some of her skin is burnt.
Her wrists are raw and bruised. She can hardly keep her eyes open.

room.dialogue: Get us out of here, Geralt.
Why did we come back here?
room.description: Joss's #mother^ staggers along, clinging to her son.
room.detailedDescription: She can hardly keep her eyes open.
